name: tg-eth-wallet-bot
description: Telegram bot to monitor Ethereum wallet deposits and notify a chat.

scripts.deploy: npm run prepare-data && serverless deploy --stage dev
scripts.deploy:dev:on: npm run prepare-data && DEV_FREQUENT_SCAN=true DEV_SUMMARY_SCAN=true serverless deploy --stage dev
scripts.deploy:dev:off: npm run prepare-data && DEV_FREQUENT_SCAN=false DEV_SUMMARY_SCAN=false serverless deploy --stage dev
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run prepare-data && serverless deploy --stage prod
scripts.deploy-full: npm run deploy && npm run upload-assets
